title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; moire
description: Two fragments of white silk moire with brocaded design in shades of green, red, pink, and yellow. Symmetrical arrangement of floral sprays reversed on either side of central line.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; moire. Gift of Clarence Hoblitzelle. 1912-10-9-a,b.
